content: I am a fourth year undergraduate student at Department of Metallurgical Engineering and Materials Science, IIT Bombay, enrolled in its Dual Degree program with minor in Industrial Engineering and Operations Research. My interests include Finance, Machine learning and Consulting. I am currently interning at Centre for Analytical Finance, Indian School of Business, Hyderabad and I've previously interned at the Standard Chartered Bank.

title: Anup Hanamant Itale

summary: Performed unsupervised K-modes and K-prototypes clustering on customer loan data to identify grouping within loan applications, studied summary statistics based on position of point in cluster
title: K-Modes and K-prototypes clustering

summary: Implemented Post Earnings Announcement Drift (PEAD) momentum based strategy on Nifty50 universe with rolling window and SUE method
title: PEAD trading in Python

summary: Implemented mean reversion based Pairs trading strategy on Nifty 50 universe, with a rolling window of pair formation and testing returns
title: Pairs trading in Python

summary: Evaluated the sentiment of 10K and 10Q reports of US firms, created database of such reports by web scraping, used Loughran & Mcdonald dictionary and NTUSD-Fin dictionary
title: Textual analysis of company filings

summary: Evaluated the sentiment of financial news using vader library and provided a sentiment score to the articles
title: Sentiment analysis of Financial News using Vader library
